PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MultiStateOutput
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Defines the characteristics of a multi-state output.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfStates
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of states for the multi-state Input.

PropertyDef.Name: StateText
PropertyDef.Definition: String values to identify the state condition. Upper limit of the list is equal to the NumberOfStates.

PropertyDef.Name: AlarmValues
PropertyDef.Definition: Specifies any states the present value must equal before an EventEnable shall occur. Upper limit of the list is equal to the NumberOfStates.

PropertyDef.Name: EventEnable
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration that defines the type of event enabling

PropertyDef.Name: NotifyType
PropertyDef.Definition: Enumeration that defines the notification type
